title: 你喜欢怎么死？
author: 苦力趴
txt_content:
1.摔死
2.淹死
3.炸死
4.撑死
5.饿死
6.掉线掉死
7.怪弄死
8.崩溃
9.不想死

replies.author: Condor
replies.txt_content: 这种问题。。。

replies.author: a18964819868
replies.txt_content: 肯定是9，不死...

replies.author: ever-lose
replies.txt_content: 水帖无误,坐等删帖
